DESCRIPTION: Want something more badass than the usual rainbow-like ice cream to cool your tongue with? Then this charcoal-black icy treat is what you're looking for!

DESCRIPTION:
Sugar Dating is perceived as controversial, but apparently only when it is a lifestyle chosen by ordinary people. But what happens when this lifestyle is adopted by some of the most powerful people in the world? Is it then suddenly perfectly normal?
Why is Sugar Dating seen as such a controversial concept when many influential people, who are supposed to be our role-models and daily aspirations, engage in these type of modern and evolving relationships? Why is an ordinary Sugar Baby or Sugar Daddy blamed for it? The absolute goal of any Sugar Baby is to find someone powerful and successful and if possible to fund their entire existence. Take a moment and go through the facts below.
TITLE: Politics- A World Of Sugar Dating

DESCRIPTION: Celebrities are not the only victims of their revealing pictures being leaked on the Internet - someone has just shockingly exposed this poor owl's legs and the post went viral. People are surprised to see how long owl legs actually are.
TITLE: The Internet Is Surprised How Long Owl Legs Actually Are

DESCRIPTION: Meet Tessa the doggie, who was found tied up in a field with a 'I don't want a dog' note written by her new owner who dumped her just days after taking the dog in. She used to belong to Yvonne Radcliffe, a 76-year-old lady who recently moved to Canada. She didn't take her pooch with her worrying the doggie would be too old to survive the flight. The woman left her beloved dog to her neighbor whom she had known for 9 years.
TITLE: Sad Dog Found Abandoned In A Field With A Note On Her Neck

DESCRIPTION: Drawing Emma Watson with coloured pencil, took me around 10 hours.
TITLE: Emma Watson Coloured Pencil Sketch That Took Me 10 Hours To Complete

DESCRIPTION: My images have been described in many ways, but 'fun' is my favourite description. I like to bring together unlikely objects and places to create irony and juxtapositions, in the hope of getting a quick laugh. Sometimes I like to add a play on words too.

DESCRIPTION: I painted this egg for the annual Ukrainian Easter Egg Festival. It is called Birds' Universe. It took me 20 days to complete it, its height is 35 (90 cm), diameter - 24 (60 cm).
TITLE: I Painted An Egg For The Annual Ukrainian Easter Egg Festival

DESCRIPTION: Do you remember the details of your very first birthday? Of course you don't. But Rebecca Sharrock does, because the 27-year-old from Brisbane has got something called Highly Superior Autobiographical Memory (HSAM). It's a condition that stops people from being able to forget anything, and it's thought that only around 60-80 people in the world have it.
TITLE: Meet The Woman Who Can Remember Every Day Of Her Life. There Are Only 80 People Like That Worldwide

DESCRIPTION: Meet Petey, the puppy who was left to die in a park with his brother because he was different. A woman from Sacramento, California, saw the doggies while walking her son home from school and immediately rushed them to the vet. They were starved, lethargic, and cold as ice. Unfortunately, Petey's brother passed away upon arrival to the clinic, but Petey decided to fight for his life.
TITLE: Dog Left To Die For Being Different Finally Finds Couple Who Loves Him For Who He Is

DESCRIPTION: American singer Nichole Nordeman was sitting in a cafe when she overheard a FaceTime conversation that was so sweet, it made her tear up. It was a young couple talking to their baby and his grandparents. The singer described it as being something completely pure - you could feel that the young parents loved their baby to the moon and back and had a serious separation anxiety.
TITLE: Woman Overhears The Purest Conversation Between Parents And Baby, Gets Shocked To See Who The Baby Is

DESCRIPTION:
A few years ago, I saw Daniel Kordan's beautiful panoramas of the Uyuni Salt Flats in Bolivia, and knew that it was a place I had to visit. My fiancee and I have been traveling through South America for the past six months, and I planned these shots months in advance, down to the day and the hour, with the Photopills app.
I was out until about 3am that night shooting the night sky, and returned to the Salt hotel to find the doors locked.
TITLE: Alone In The Dark, I Found The Brightest Lights Within

DESCRIPTION: In my spare time I create ceramic sculptures inspired by typical elements of Sardinian culture and a fantasy architecture. Many features characterize this port city: saltiness, fish, noise of shipowner's workshop..
TITLE: I Create Ceramic Villages Inspired By Sardinian Traditions

DESCRIPTION: I make sneakers with rice :)

DESCRIPTION:
Whether you know of Jungs theories on archetypes, general mythology, cultural symbolism or just the way you look at animals. There are a lot of symbolic energy in different types of animals.
To understand and connect with these animals, I made a collection of Totems that dive into both facade and deeper symbolism of these creatures.
TITLE: I Create Artful Poster Totems, To Connect With The Energy Of These Spirit Animals

DESCRIPTION: I use this technique for representation of shadows and facial features or details.I get my inspiration from my everyday routine or, if I found something interesting or something that I like on the internet, I try to integrate that in my style of drawing.
TITLE: I Combined One-Line-Drawings Technique With Colored Markers To Create Expressive Portraits

DESCRIPTION: What do you get when you cross Joffrey Baratheon from Game of Thrones with a cute (if not slightly worried-looking) pug dog? You get an epic Photoshop battle of course!

DESCRIPTION: A 13-year-old from Delft, one of the poorest communities in Cape Town, South Africa, recently walked two miles to save his doggie. When the boy realized his puppy was sick and stopped eating, plus started having bloody diarrhea, he took it upon himself to find help.
TITLE: This 13-Year-Old Boy Walked 2 Miles Just To Save A Dying Puppy

DESCRIPTION: The world around us is full of distracting, irritating noise. Whether it's a rock concert, a screaming baby on a plane, or just the general racket of a big city, sometimes we just want to tune it all out. Knops, a set of game-changing new ear plugs, will let you do exactly that.

DESCRIPTION: I grew up in Tampa, Florida, raised by a pretty badass dude. As far back as I can remember, my dad was a hardass. He was a soldier and had completed Ranger school when I was small, and after he retired, he rode rodeo (bulls and saddle bronc) professionally for a few years.

DESCRIPTION: Dinosaurs have always fascinated me. After a trip to a local museum and looking at some model on the exhibit I decided to create my own. Since I have been doing Paper Models for over 20 years, I used my skill to create a 3d model that became the patterns to make this sculpture.
TITLE: T-Rex Sculpture Made Of Out Paper

DESCRIPTION: I have painted with just about everything in my career and honestly Wood Stain is my favorite medium. The Dremel adds another dimension creating texture by tearing into the wood. This style has been 4 years in the making and I don't see me leaving this technique anytime soon.

DESCRIPTION: I like to give new life to old furniture that people don't want. With just a little time and spray paint anything is possible.

DESCRIPTION:
Hello, my name is Hugo Silva and I am a designer and illustrator from Lisbon.
Every week we receive at the company office a fruit basket with apples, pears, oranges and bananas.
I started a parallel project that has become an addiction.

DESCRIPTION: I am a self taught artist who resides in central Oregon. I travels around the U.S and abroad with my partner and two children.
TITLE: My Hand Drawn Wild Slice Nature Sticker Designs

DESCRIPTION: My name is Tara Catherine Pandeya, I am a second-generation dancer and choreographer who has been dancing since the age of three. I have been touring the world as a dancer for the last ten years.In 2010, I ran away with the circus.

DESCRIPTION: So many things change when a person ages. Wrinkles, changing hairlines, graying hair, the list goes on... But one thing that always stays the same is a person's identity.

DESCRIPTION: I paint what depression feels like.

DESCRIPTION:
My project is called LINESTORY.
My name is Clémence Lerondeau, i am French, based in Paris. I am a self taught artist.

DESCRIPTION:
Joongwon Jeong is a hyper-realistic painter from South Korea who uses acrylic paint on canvas. The artist meticulously uses real models, photos or busts of historical characters to create his works. 
Each of his paintings are so detailed that many people can confuse them with giant photographs.
TITLE: Giant Hyperrealistic Portraits By South Korean Artist Joongwon Jeong

DESCRIPTION: An imperfect vision of the goddesses of today.
TITLE: I Draw Goddesses Of Today

DESCRIPTION:
The project Origins/Connection/Force shows three different perspectives upon the existence of kingpin, the human being.
The first perspective refers to our origins, the initial state, where white symbolizes purity, cleanliness and both spiritual and physical integrity. The second perspective catches on the harmony, the connection of the human being, both as spirit and a physical being, with his living environment, nature, a vital connection for his good functioning.
TITLE: Three Different Perspectives Of Our Existence That I Portrayed In This Sculpture

DESCRIPTION: Saturday, on Earth Day, scientists across the globe took to the streets for the 'March For Science'. From software engineers to simply science supporters to even dogs - they all gathered together to celebrate science and the role it plays in our everyday day lives.
TITLE: 10+ Of The Best Signs From The March For Science Shows What Happens When You Piss Of The Scientists

DESCRIPTION: It probably comes as no surprise to learn that we here at Bored Panda know a lot about pandas. We're also experts at identifying just what is and what isn't a panda. So believe us when we say that this happy husky isn't a husky at all. He's a panda!
TITLE: Meet Maru, The Happiest Husky In The World That Is Secretly A Panda

DESCRIPTION:
Hi! I'm Chrystal Giam, a freelance graphic designer and illustrator from Malaysia, but currently based in a country of the complete opposite, Finland.
Here are some food illustrations I made for an ongoing project called Foodman to recreate daily situations with personified food. I like my food cute, funny and punny, so I hope you'll like them too!
TITLE: I Draw Food With A Handful Of Character And A Dash Of Humour

DESCRIPTION: I am a paper cutting artist based in the UK. My work often depicts birds and nature, and this piece is the first in a series depicting the natural wildlife which surrounds our canals and rivers. Having spent much of my childhood on a canal boat, it is wildlife that I am familiar with and very fond of.
TITLE: I Created A Paper Cut Artwork Depicting Some Of The Wildlife Found Around The Waterways Of Britain

DESCRIPTION:
Over a year's work and billions of calculations by artist Jonty Hurwitz, not to mention a whole production team - you wouldn't imagine that this sculpture is all about childhood.
I look back on my own childhood and marvel at how the line between imagination and reality was so blurred. Somehow I needed to try and capture that complex relationship in this artwork.
TITLE: Have Your Forgotten How To Play?

DESCRIPTION: I like to draw. I draw since I was a little kid. Most of my drawings were portraits or some things related to school subjects.
TITLE: It Takes About Three Weeks To Complete Each Of My Realistic Can Drawings

DESCRIPTION:
For me, Halloween is 365 days a year, so when I found a 1:1 silicone skull mold, I knew I had to make a skull cake out of it.
And since I can't eat the whole thing by myself, I took it to work..
TITLE: I Made A Skull Cake And Brought It To Work To Scare My Coworkers

DESCRIPTION:
I am a freelance camera assistant, and so, either my job is very busy, or my job is vary scarce, I doodle in my spare time to worry less and to remember things arn't as scary as we think they are!
I store more of them here!
TITLE: I Draw Sleepy Monsters And Robots To Help Relax

DESCRIPTION:
I try to put my daily frustrations, inspirations, thoughts and just little struggles in images.
It kinda helps me to look at them from the side. Sometimes they are easier to deal with this way.
TITLE: I Put My Daily Frustrations, Inspirations, Thoughts And Just Little Struggles In Illustrations

DESCRIPTION: I started drawing when I was 13 as a way to cope with life as opposed to a more self-destructive path. It has proven to be therapeutic and over the years I got much better, and then finally started painting in acrylic three years ago, and ever since I have taken off with acrylic..
TITLE: I Paint Celebrities Using Acrylic Paints

DESCRIPTION: Do you know what PICNIC means? No, we're not talking about an alfresco meal you pack into a hamper and enjoy in a sunny field. We're talking about the acronym, because PICNIC stands for Problem In Chair, Not In Computer. If this sounds familiar then chances are that you probably work in IT support, and if that's the case then you'll no doubt relate to these funny and sadly accurate comics by Li-Anne Dias.
TITLE: IT Workers Share the Most Idiotic Things People Have Told Them

DESCRIPTION: Since completing his Master's degree in Fine Art , Shadrach has been making waves on the art scene here in the Caribbean . The prolific artist from Wotten Waven, Dominica has producing art since 1994 and currently owns a signature painting style called a Liquid fingerprint . His older brother, Gharan Burton and his father David Burton are also artists but Shadrach was mentored at an early age by two prominent local artists by the names of Earl Etienne and Ellingworth Moses.
TITLE: After Spending 8 Years In China , I Have Reinvented Myself As An Artist

DESCRIPTION: Last year during a trip to the Philippines I was faced with the problem of a broken travel adapter. The batteries of my devices were dead, so I had to find a quick solution. I took a pair of pliers and worked on my Australian USB charger until it (somehow) fits into the socket.
TITLE: I Invented A Travel Adapter Which Fit In Every Socket Over The World

DESCRIPTION: With some of the most powerful world leaders being in denial about science-backed things like climate change, no wonder the situation got so bad, even the dogs decided to protest in the March for Science. Big and small doggos gathered together to support their human fellows on a mission to save the planet and secure the future of science. The protest took place last Saturday in 518 cities all across the US. It's not a coincidence it happened on Earth Day - one of the aims of this march was to increase the awareness about the Global Warming and press the government to address it. Come on, even the dogs understand how important this is!
TITLE: 10+ Dogs Who Marched For Science, And Totally Saved The World

DESCRIPTION: I started studying Tarot quite a few years ago. I became not only fascinated with the cards themselves, but also the fragments of history and many origin stories surrounding the cards. During my studies I started to see images of the cards.
TITLE: Tarot Cards. Olde Symbolism, Modern Images

DESCRIPTION:
A collection of beautiful birds I captured from India.

DESCRIPTION:
I am an architect with a huge passion for hand drawing and history.
I combined these passions by portraying historical buildings and monuments, as a way to revive them and to keep them alive.
I believe hand drawing should still play a crucial role even in the digital era and architects should not dislearn to represent architecture through 'traditional tools.
TITLE: My Fifty Shades Of Graphite: Incredibly Realistic Drawings Of Historical Buildings

DESCRIPTION:
Couple together travels to the United states for the first time and decides to film the best moments. They took a roadtrip to 4 states - California, Nevada, Arizona and Utah, drove 5000km and visited cities like Los Angeles, Las Vegas and San Francisco.
They took some amazing shots at the Death Valley, Yosemite national park, Grand Canyon and Antelope canyon.

DESCRIPTION: The physical pain of child birth is one of those things that men are mercifully exempt from having to experience. But have you ever wondered just how a man would cope with having to give birth? Well as you can see from the hilarious video below, the answer to that question is not very well.
TITLE: Guy Tries Labour Pain Simulator, Regrets It Immediately

DESCRIPTION: Meet a girl named Amber and her therapy donkey Shocks - both of them had a rough start in life... Shocks was found with a rope tied around his neck and skin covered in lesions and sores from being tethered. Luckily, he was rescued and taken to The Donkey Sanctuary in Birmingham, England, where he met Amber in 2013.

DESCRIPTION:
As a passionate photographer and filmmaker, when the snow fell in Switzerland a few months ago, I couldn't resist waking up at 5 am and taking the first train to the Filisur, a small village in the heart of the swiss alps. After hiking for a couple of minutes, I reach this spot perched above this magical bridge.
All was covered with fresh snow.

DESCRIPTION:

DESCRIPTION: A war photographer's instinct is to take photographs, regardless of what's happening in front of the lens. But when a massive explosion took out a convoy of buses filled with evacuees in Syria recently, it wasn't Abd Alkader Habak's photographer instinct that kicked in: it was his human instinct that made him put his camera down and pick up a boy badly injured by the blast.
TITLE: Syrian Photographer Stops Shooting To Save Injured Boy, Falls On His Knees After Realizing What Happened (NSFW)

DESCRIPTION:
What do you do with your life when your kids go off to college? Do you go back to work? Volunteer? Get a degree?
I was faced with this question in fall 2013 when my only child went off to college. I had received a scholarship to be a special needs drawing teacher, but never finished a semester at college. Instead, I got married, had a career in the corporate world, and raised a family.
TITLE: Mom Follows Her Dream To Be A Fine Vehicle Painter

DESCRIPTION: What is one thing on this planet that can make ANYTHING look better? Yes, the answer is googly eyes! Eye stickers on your cat's butt, eye stickers on a coffee machine, eye stickers on the tube of mayo... They make the otherwise 'dead' objects come alive. One simple sticky touch and the world looks like a much better place to be. Ok, but enough of googly praise - check it out for yourself.

DESCRIPTION: Let's be honest, the future of mankind is looking pretty shaky at the moment. Talk of war dominates the news on a daily basis, and nuclear fallout seems inevitable if the US and North Korea keep flexing their muscles. But don't worry, because while most of humanity will certainly perish in the ensuring fallout of nuclear war, you'll be safe and sound in your very own luxury nuclear bunker 45ft below the ground in Savannah, Georgia.

DESCRIPTION:
There's a place in Colombia called Cocora Valley where wax palm trees grow up to 70 meters tall.
You hike up there past some streams, crossing some creaky old swing bridges (Indiana Jones style) and through some cloud forests.
When I first saw the valley, my jaw just dropped.

DESCRIPTION:
I live in a cabin in the woods in British Columbia, Canada, and I like to photograph the creatures that hop, crawl, slither, or ooze by for tea.
Their manners are excellent, the gossip is always juicy, and we have enchanted tea parties.

DESCRIPTION:
After years around the world, they came back to their small Canadian town to create vibrant street art with their community.
Lisa and Matthew live in Moncton, a small town in the province of New Brunswick in Eastern Canada mainly known for lobsters and arboreal forests. Born and raised here, they decided one day to travel the world to work, learn, create and live something else for some years.

DESCRIPTION: I am a synesthete and I see people like swirling colors of poetry. Colors are adjacent to adjectives in my mind and it is often possible to associate a color to a person with an initial facial observation. However, once more details are absorbed, different shades and tones of color are interpreted.

DESCRIPTION: There are a lot of potential pet owners but some of them need a little bit of inspiration to adopt. Photographer Amol Jadhav and art director Pranav Bhide have created a powerful campaign for World For All Animal Care And Adoptions in Mumbai to spread awareness about their adoption event, and - most importantly - it was effective!

DESCRIPTION:
I have always been an 'artist', I just didn't realize what that meant until my mental illness appeared. I despise the term 'mentally ill'; it implies that who I am as a person is fundamentally corrupted and broken.
Unfortunately, as soon as I tell people what I struggle with, I feel like that's all they see me as.
TITLE: I Was Diagnosed With Schizophrenia At The Age Of 17, So I Started Drawing My Hallucinations To Cope With It

DESCRIPTION: Italian fashion house Dolce & Gabbana has joined forces with Italian manucfacturer Smeg to create this beautifully eye-catching line of home applicances inspired by traditional Sicilian patterns and motifs.

DESCRIPTION:
At first it was strange, but now the term selfie has become normal in our daily lives. Selfie is nothing more than a photo that a person takes of himself, whether it's at home, eating, at a soccer stadium, on the beach, or wherever he/she is.
With the increase in the use of smartphones and the large number of social networks, selfies have become a world's fever.
TITLE: 10+ Vintage Celebrity Selfies Before Smartphones

DESCRIPTION: If you spend your days surfing the never-ending Instagram feed, you might've already heard of a freelance illustrator called Isabelle Staub, who rocked the platform with her fresh reimaginings of classic Disney Princesses. What you might not know, though, is that this series also helped the artist to get out of a serious creative block.

DESCRIPTION: Ahhh, growing up with your sibling. We bet you have stacks of photo albums documenting your best childhood adventures, awkward and staged studio photoshoots, silly antics, and stupid face expressions. Well, the good news is that recreating pictures from times when you were still a kid is a trend now. It makes for a perfect gift for your loved ones, allows you to behave like a child again (if only for a little while), and, of course, it lets you and your sibling have a good giggle. Below is the list of the funniest and most creative photo recreations to get you inspired.
TITLE: 10+ Siblings Who Hilariously Recreated Their Childhood Photos

DESCRIPTION: Grab your magnifying glasses and put your thinking hats on, because boy, do we have a mystery for you! Just hours ago, a drawing went viral online, which at first glance seems like a depiction of an ordinary diner in the 40s or 50s. But if you look closer, you'll see that there's nothing normal about this image whatsoever...
TITLE: This Picture Is Full Of Secrets And The More You Look At It The More Frightening It Becomes

DESCRIPTION:
When I had to prepare for my wedding, I knew I want a paper bouquet but I didn't want to order it online, so I've made one by myself. It was really simple but I've improved my technique to offer a better quality.
Since then I create kusudama paper bouquets on free time - it's not my full-time job, just a hobby which hopefully one day become something powerful.

DESCRIPTION: 17-year-old Lamyaa from Pennsylvania was recently engaged in a group chat with friends. When everybody started discussing Donald Trump, Lamyaa, who is an Arab Muslim Woman, contributed to the discussion with her own strong views about the president. Realizing that she was a Muslim, a mutual friend in the group chat, whom she didn't know, responded to her comments in the only way that idiots know how.

DESCRIPTION: German artist Tim Bengel has developed a unique style of painting by using two uncommon materials for the craft - sand and gold. Starting with a sticky empty canvas, Tim creates a design with black sand and gold (this drawing can take weeks), and then fills the rest with white sand.
TITLE: Stunning Sand And Gold Painting Technique

DESCRIPTION: Recycled Beautifully creates elegant jewelry that starts as garbage. Celina Ortiz and her husband find discarded television sets and deconstruct them, removing their copper or aluminum wire in the process. With this valuable material in hand, they wrap the material around stone pendants in a tree-like design.
TITLE: Discarded Copper Wire Twisted Into Trees To Beautifully Frame Dazzling Stone Pendants

DESCRIPTION:
Hello! My name is Ruso Tsignadze, People know me as Ruso Tsig, or Bookson. Tsignadze means son of book, this is why they call me BOOKSON.
I'm motion graphic animator, concept artist, traditional animator, graphic designer, from Georgia.

DESCRIPTION: In South Asia, no matter how independent or old you are, you stay with your parents, who will never cease to instill 'the VALUES' in you. Here are some conversations for you to follow, relate to and enjoy a South Asian perspective of Adulting, while staying with parents.

DESCRIPTION: My name is Ervin Boer, I'm from Romania and I am an automotive photographer. I am a big fan of fisheye photography. Last year I took some shots with my GoPro while driving, I really liked what I saw so I bought a Samyang 12mm fisheye lens.
TITLE: I Photographed More Than 300 Car Interiors With A Fisheye In A Year

DESCRIPTION:
This year together with Ingrida we travelled around Southeast Asia, spend there 6,5 months, visited 9 countries and had a great adventure. But Myanmar (second largest SEA country after Indonesia, also known as Burma) stuck deep in my head and I am still thinking how to get back there.
Visitors can easily get 28 days tourist visa which costs USD 50, but for sure it is not enough to see all of the beauty which this country has to offer.
TITLE: I Spent 3 Weeks In Myanmar And Realised That It Is The Most Amazing Country Where I Have Ever Been!

DESCRIPTION: Having a mother of a day? Tired of the state of the world? Looking for something to cheer you up? Then look no further than this seriously wholesome list of animal memes.

DESCRIPTION:
During my first episode of depression, I was reclusive thereby I subsequently locked myself in my apartment for one year, I cut myself off from my family, friends, I stopped studying, I only went out at night. But the worst thing was that I stopped talking.
Only thanks to these pictures I could contact the world, and show how it feels.
TITLE: The Pictures That Saved My Life 6 Years Ago

DESCRIPTION: Just a few pictures from my day to day life of living with my gorgeous but naughty puppy Millie and my cat Bella who frankly couldn't less about me as long as I keep dishing out the food.

DESCRIPTION: In my last post about what life is like having 3 small kids, I showed the stressful times. The moments that are not often shared on social media. In this post, I decided to go the opposite way to show that even though my kids cry and make messes, they are also very loving and cute.
TITLE: When My Children Show Their Love For One Another: The Upside To Having 3 Little Kids

DESCRIPTION: Meet Maro the cat, the cutest dinner date ever. Since this Japan-based kitty was 7 months old, he has lived with his human mother Rie Matsui. Matsui is passionate about photography and Japanese food culture. So, as soon as she realized that Maro is such a relaxed cat who is ok with almost anything as long as he gets to hang out with his human, the woman came up with a brilliant idea. She started dressing up Maro in the cutest outfits and taking pictures of her feline as her dinner companion.
TITLE: Cosplaying Cat Chef Dines With His Mom Every Night In Different Outfit

DESCRIPTION:
Just a sample of comics I made for my website.

DESCRIPTION: Don't throw away broken, used toys. Make a lamp from them. Idea isn't new, but could give awesome results.

DESCRIPTION:
I'm just sharing with you some of my art, I believe you'll find it interesting.
I'm an Artist based in LA, currently showing I 4 galleries in LA ( solo show at the Nuetra museum and a group show at Gregorio Escalante gallery).
Through Art, I examine the human species based on the social and cultural values to which it is a bond, and to those ideals, we grasp in order to maintain our sanity.
TITLE: I Examine The Human Species By Creating Trippy Art (NSFW)

DESCRIPTION:
An ice cream parlor for dogs was opened in Mexico. The place has a varied menu special for the canine tastes, accompanied by natural yoghurt and lactobacilli good for the digestion of the animal.
According to the owner of Don Paletto, Mauricio Montoya, the production of the ice cream underwent a veterinary monitoring, which developed the food removing the harmful additives to the digestive system of the animals.
TITLE: Ice Cream Parlor For Dogs Opens In Mexico

DESCRIPTION:
I worked in London for just under 3 years, catching the 7:19 from Rayleigh, Essex - I joined the commuters heading into the city.
The first year I was exhausted, I had completed a photography degree, and was now working in Marketing - and, after a year, I realised I had barely picked up my camera.
So I got some 35mm from the pound shop, put it in one of the point & shoots I had picked up in a Charity Shop (I have far too many!) - and here was born my 'Life on Film' project.
TITLE: I Photographed Nostalgic London In Film

DESCRIPTION:
I am Anna, the artist behind these joyful artisan felt mice.
I put hours of loving attention into the tiniest details, to bring these beautifully intricate, utterly adorable felt mice to life, so they can light up your day in an instant.
I am a big Doctor Who fan, so I couldn't wait to mousify my favourite characters for you to enjoy.
TITLE: Doctor Who Characters I Created, As Adorable Hand-Crafted Artisan Mice

DESCRIPTION:
When Nate set off school with his prized Pokemon card collection he couldn't have imagined that they would all be stolen from him by cruel, selfish classmates.
Poor Nate, who has special needs, was devastated. So his Dad and friends took to the Facebook group The Geek Asylum to appeal for any spare Pokemon cards anyone may have so that Nate could re-build his collection.
TITLE: Adorable Little Boy Has 400 Pokemon Cards Stolen And What Happens Next Will Bring You To Tears

DESCRIPTION: Will you believe me if I say that all these flowers in the pictures were created from clay? Yes, indeed, they were. Each petal and each leaf is molded manually using special and self-hardening polymer clay.
TITLE: You Will Never Guess What These Flowers Are Made From!

DESCRIPTION:
In the Bear's Land there is a place where people offered a unique feeling to their village, Ciocanesti. Undoubtedly, this is the most underrated artistic village in the world.
Ciocanesti is situated in the Northern part of Romania and it is known for the traditional way of living here.
TITLE: This Is The Most Underrated Artistic Village In The World

DESCRIPTION: I am the Art Sherpa. I think the greatest part of Art is getting new people to take up painting. To jump in and give something They never thought they could do a TRY.
TITLE: Q-Tips Can Turn You Into An Artist!

DESCRIPTION: In a world where differing styles of color photography change as quickly as the latest fad, I find the timeless consistency of black and white imagery to be a comforting escape. Without the visible distractions of color, all that is left is the raw emotion of the moment and the opportunity to delve a little deeper into the story. One of my favorite subjects to portray as emotive monochromatic imagery is children because of their uncanny ability to innocently teach us important life lessons that we often tend to overlook or forget as we grow older.
TITLE: When The Soul Speaks: My Thought Provoking Conceptual Imagery Of Children Tell A Story Without A Face

DESCRIPTION: Dogs are man's best friend, as everybody knows, but if there's one thing our canine companions love almost as much as they love us humans, it's the camera!
TITLE: 10+ Times Asshole Dogs Ruined Perfect Shots

DESCRIPTION: After artist Stephanie Kilgast's cat Arya died, the artist decided to honor her with a sculpture. We had to put [Arya] to sleep <...> after a lot of health struggle, Stephanie says. Sad of her loss, but relieved she doesn't suffer anymore, I've sculpted her as a tribute.
TITLE: A Cat Made Of Clay

DESCRIPTION:
3 years ago Thai illustrator Tuna Dunn began publishing beautifully realistic comics about crushes, relationships, and heartbreak on the internet. Artist creates short stories of romance, longing and sometimes painful moments and looks like people can truly relate to them.
Tuna, whose full name is Tunlaya Dunnvatanachit, has almost 58k followers on Facebook.
TITLE: The Beauty And Pain Of Relationships In 10+ Comics By Thai Artist Tuna Dunn

DESCRIPTION: Let's meet Labuda, the traveler from Poland who left his settled life to travel around the world. He visited 5 continets and beat 40 thousands of miles in 974 days. He set up a challenge not to pay for an accomodation.
TITLE: What Is Your Plan For Today? On Such A Day As Today Labuda Set Out On A Journey Around The World!

DESCRIPTION: Buster the doggie lives with his humans in Dublin - but he is in a long-distance relationship with someone who is based in Ireland's Dingle peninsula. It all started back in 2013 when Buster and his owner Traolach Ó Buachalla went there on holidays and met a tall dark donkey named Jack. Buster and the animal got on very well from the second they saw each other. The first time they met, they were just so friendly to each other, Buachalla told The Dodo.
TITLE: Dog And Donkey Figured Out This Whole Long-Distance Relationship Thing

DESCRIPTION: There are a ton of bad photos online and it's mostly because people simply can't be bothered with editing. But as this tutorial will show you, you don't need to sink a ton of time in a single image, all it takes is just 5 minutes!
TITLE: 5-Minute Tutorial Reveals How To Make Boring Photos Look Awesome

DESCRIPTION: A few innocent drops of rain can be fatal to even the most expensive equipment. So to keep it safe Nubrella created this innovative hands-free and wind-resistant umbrella - it keeps the photographer and his gear dry, but doesn't restrict him from taking pictures.
TITLE: Innovative Hands-Free Umbrella That Keeps Your Camera Dry When Shooting In The Rain

DESCRIPTION: The book 'Phobias & Fetishes' is an illustrative insight into their psychological origins, it shows the effect and the cause of certain childhood events that may lead into something unexpected in adulthood.
TITLE: I Created A Book About Phobias And Fetishes

DESCRIPTION:
My work with acrylic plastic began with assembling laser cut cacti designs. I noticed that the most laser cut works of art often were one dimensional and lacked contour and body.
The cacti were the first designs I made.
TITLE: I Create Fluorescent Acrylic Plant Sculptures

DESCRIPTION:
My friend and I both had swimming with Whale Sharks towards the top of our bucket lists so we found some spare time and took a 1,500 mile road trip down to Mulege, Mexico.
We started in Fallbrook, California and drove our 1991 Toyota Hiace which we converted into a livable van down to Mexico. 700 miles later we arrived in Mulege and paid $8 for a camping spot in Bahia Conception.
TITLE: Crossed Off A Bucket List: Swimming With Whale Sharks

DESCRIPTION:
After years of battling depression, I've finally decided to get off my ass and do something about it.
All my projects are made with repurposed wood and all shaded with pointilism. It is the most therapeutic thing I've ever done.
TITLE: I Hand-Burn Images Into Forgotten Wood

DESCRIPTION:
In Russian prisons, tattoos serve as a unique language of symbols and the rules for reading them are passed on by oral tradition. The illustrations they wear on their skin tells the story of their closed society, a society with its own hierarchy and social structure.
Tel-Aviv based Russian artist Valeria Monis connects the subversive art of Russian criminal tattoos with traditional blue porcelain design, uniting two opposed but equally important and influential strands of Russian art history.
TITLE: Handmade Criminal Ceramics By Valeria Monis

DESCRIPTION: A serie of 8 surrealistic illustrations based on dreams and their interpretations.
TITLE: Dreams And Nightmares In Technicolor

DESCRIPTION: I photographed the beauty side of Bulgaria. In 2016 and 2017 I traveled a lot in my country. My plan was to visit some of the greatest and the most beautiful places in Bulgaria and to photograph them.
TITLE: I Photographed The Beauty Of Bulgaria

DESCRIPTION: Meet the dog who is addicted to attention, and goes to just the right place to get it - a local school. Sean Conway is a local resident in County Cavan, Ireland. He posted a photo of the doggie earlier this week when he was visiting the school his sister goes to. I noticed that the dog was waiting at the wall outside, and some kids were coming over to pet him, Conway told The Dodo. He waited patiently and was there for about 10 minutes before he left. Apparently, he does that every day.
TITLE: Every Day This Dog Comes To School To Get Hugs And Waits To Be Petted

DESCRIPTION: Marrying someone with a good sense of humor is a one-way ticket to years of laughter, and these wives prove it. They're creative, they're hilarious, and they're honestly trolls sometimes, but that can only make their husbands love them more. In fact, sharing a good sense of humor is viewed by many marriage specialists as the key to a happy union.
TITLE: 10+ Hilarious Wives That All Men Secretly Wish They Were Married To

DESCRIPTION: We've covered the young presidents of USA already, but let's broaden the scope now and take a rare glimpse at the leaders from around the world before they became the almighty God-like figures.

DESCRIPTION: As anybody who's worked in retail will know, customers can try the patience of even the saintliest of people. After all, the customer is always right, and so no matter what people say or do to you, you've just got to suck it up and take it like a good employee.
TITLE: 8 Perfect Responses For Rude Customers

DESCRIPTION: At first glance, these mugs look like your average kitchenware affair. But reach the bottom of your morning coffee and you'll find a surprise of Jurassic proportions..
TITLE: Feel Like The Laziest Palaeontologist Ever With These Dino Mugs

DESCRIPTION:
My name is Emily Hare and I have been in love with myths, legends and folklore my whole life. I spent much of my childhood drawing monsters and dragons and I never grew out of it! For the past year I have been creating my very own fantasy world.
Strangehollow is a huge enchanted forest where you will find all sorts of creatures, some familiar and some which you may never have heard of.
TITLE: I Illustrated Unusual Beasts Inspired By Myths, Legends And Folklore

DESCRIPTION: The beauty world never ceases to surprise me. It feels like there is a new trend every other day and each of them is crazier than the one before. And the latest Insta-trend is feather brows.

DESCRIPTION: You know how it is. Your mom buys you something, and it's totally the wrong thing, but you don't want to hurt her feelings and so you pretend to actually love it.

DESCRIPTION: If you take a deeper look, the news media isn't as honest as it seems. Reporters often blur the lines between facts and fiction to make a story more appealing for their audience. Dustin Rogers, a comics author and app developer from Columbus, Ohio, has cleverly exposed the dirty side of corporate news agencies in his latest webcomic News Dogs.
TITLE: How Media Actually Works, Summed Up In One Clever Comic

DESCRIPTION: The New Bazar of Tirana has gotten a new lease of life. Ironically, approximately 87 years after it was first opened, today it looks younger than ever, modern and fresh, proudly bearing its name as the newest and trendiest traditional bazaar in town.The revitalization of the New Bazaar neighborhood is an ambitious project, totaling approximately $5.
TITLE: Bid Goodbye To The Old, The New Bazaar Of Tirana Is Now Brand New!

DESCRIPTION:
I am the creator of fully posable, extremely cute, fantasy sloths. Each one is hand made and made with the sole purpose of bringing a smile to your face.
I love making them but I absolutely adore people's reactions to them! Especially when they give them hugs and kisses, which the sloths really enjoy.
TITLE: I Create Fantasy Rainbow Sloths That Are So Cute You Might Burst

DESCRIPTION: Nothing makes high school more of a miserable experience than a terrible teacher. We all had that one class that we dreaded walking into because we knew they'd be there. This former student was berated and bullied by his algebra teacher throughout his senior year, but decided to put an end to it, and is now sharing his incredible story of revenge almost 16 years later.
TITLE: Teacher Keeps Insulting Her Students For 10 Years, So This Student Destroys Her Career

DESCRIPTION: This past weekend, me (photographer Karen Jerzyk) and a team of models, makeups artists, a designer and a florist took over the historical Oliver Bronson House in Hudson, NY. We lugged tons of props, flowers, makeup and wardrobe with us over multiple states to transform the beautiful home into a dark fairytale. We had only four hours to complete eleven elaborate scenes.
TITLE: We Took Over A Defunct Mansion And Turned It Into A Dark Fairytale

DESCRIPTION:
I have been creating with Polymer Clay practically my whole life. I like to play a lot and have a hard time keeping to one theme.
I think this mindset has helped me push myself to experiment.

DESCRIPTION: LIX PEN was created as a professional tool specifically targeting architects, designers and the entire spectrum of creative individuals, giving them the ability to use a new technique of drawing and communication by creating free standing and rigid structures through a portable and interactive means. LIX PEN is user-friendly, smart and ergonomic. Its beautiful design is made out of high-quality materials and advanced finishing procedure.

DESCRIPTION:
I made Star Wars Easter eggs out of edible fondant and plastic eggs. I stuffed each egg with a few coins so my kids could eat the outside and then have a treat in the middle.
Each egg took me 20-30 minutes to make and I created twelve designs.

DESCRIPTION: Scottish graphic designer Reilly is making fashion fans a little uncomfortable with his latest project. These reworked logos are so convincing that one might be fooled into thinking Marc Jacobs was always a pizza shop.

DESCRIPTION:
Last weekend was the first weekend that properly felt like Spring in London. As the mercury rose I grabbed my modded camera to write a new impromptu in my ULTRAColour series of photographs.
Using a modded full-spectrum camera to take the pictures I then open them up in photoshop to really crank the saturation to levels where the pictures tell a surreal story of that magical first moment when Winter suddenly starts to feel like it's in the rear-view mirror.
TITLE: I Captured The Arrival Of Spring On London In Ultracolour

DESCRIPTION:
In Romania, people do not spay or neuter their pets and thousand of animals are abandoned and left to die a horrible death in public shelters, hit by cars of tortured and killed by monsters who think this is the only way to deal with those who cannot protect themselves.
Radu Termure is one of the many wonderful Romanians who are fighting the good fight to save these poor souls. He is the sole caretaker for over 950 dogs in Cluj! The little video you are watching was done in Jan 2017 and shows Radu, his dogs and volunteers on the current location of the shelter.
TITLE: 950 Dogs Will Lose Their Refuge At The End Of This Month And They Need Your Help

DESCRIPTION: Art is my life.

DESCRIPTION: Street art is there to surprise and inspire us, to shake up the often dull urban environments in which it can usually be found in order to give us a fresh perspective on our otherwise familiar neighborhoods and streets. But sometimes street art goes one step further than that by not only altering the world around it, but actually interacting with it.
TITLE: 10+ Amazing Street Art Installations That Cleverly Interact With Nature

DESCRIPTION: It's official and it's wonderful news for animal lovers all around the world - Taiwan has just become the first Asian country to completely ban dog and cat meat. The new legislation has it that those found guilty of eating canine or feline meat can be given a fine of up to NT$5m (over $160,000) or be sentenced to 5 years in prison. The ban also covers the selling, possession or purchasing of kitty and doggie carcasses.
TITLE: Taiwan Has Just Become The First Asian Country To Ban Eating Cats And Dogs

DESCRIPTION: No, this isn't footage of Donald Trump dancing with Vladimir Putin and Kim Jong-un and no, nobody peeled their faces off to wear in public. Believe it or not, these are actually masks by Colorado-based artist Landon Meier.

DESCRIPTION: One California-based woman named Jennifer Bowman just went out of her way to make life a little easier for her neighbor's dog, Penny, who was constantly jumping up over their tall wooden fence just to say 'hi' to the lady and her dog. Got tired of the neighbor's German shepherd jumping to peek over the fence so I made her a peeking spot, Bowman wrote online. I think she likes it.
TITLE: Neighbour Does The Most Brilliant Thing For A Dog Who Kept Jumping Every Day To Say Hello:

DESCRIPTION:
Nintendo enthusiasts rejoice! Enjoy a retro refreshment while gaming with this officially licensed heat changing Game Boy mug.
Simply add a hot drink to see the screen of the classic handheld console load up with a true gaming classic (no batteries needed).
Designed like the distinctive original Game Boy, with its retro grey style and simple button layout, the Game Boy Heat Change Mug is a great gift for gamers of all ages and is perfect for the kitchen at home or staff room at work.
TITLE: This Official Game Boy Mug Will Take Your Nintendo Fandom To The Next Level

DESCRIPTION: It's easy to romanticize the life of an artist, but the truth is that it's a very difficult profession to succeed in. The money isn't always steady, your work is often undervalued, and you'll have to put up with idiots frequently telling you to get a real job. It's therefore important to encourage and support young artists as much as possible, because if you don't then it's very easy for them to lose hope and give up.
TITLE: Why You Should Never Discourage An Artist

DESCRIPTION: Pablo Picasso's eccentric and surreal artwork has inspired countless modern artists, including Pakistani illustrator Omar Aqil, who imagined how some of the Spanish icon's most recognisable pieces would look as 3D models.

The process of creating intricate art is therapeutic, not only for the artist but also the viewer. Enjoy the #timelapse art, process and jam!

i created my very own island without spending almost any money.

DESCRIPTION:
Graduating from university and applying for jobs can be quite intimidating, especially due to the fact that many companies now implement a multi-stage application process in order to gradually whittle down the high numbers of applications that they receive.
In order to access their suitability for the job, applicants have to face several tasks - which is a bit like competing in the Triwizard Tournament but with less mortal peril and more collaborative group-based assessments.
I drew some cartoons to try and make sense of the experience of interviewing and applying for jobs in general.
TITLE: I Drew 11 Cartoons That Demonstrate The Process Of Graduating And Finding A Job

DESCRIPTION: Meet Duke, the sad doggie who was found sitting in an old armchair on a curbside in south Texas, waiting for someone to come and rescue him. For a few days, people ignored the homeless canine, until one woman posted a picture of him on Facebook and asked for someone to help. Can anyone rescue? the person wrote on Facebook. My mom said he's roamed around here for a while. He has very bad mange to the point that he looks bloody. He is also very skinny.
TITLE: Abandoned Ex-Bait Dog Lived On An Old Armchair Waiting To Be Rescued

DESCRIPTION: Gals, let's be honest, some of our first-world-Problems are somewhat hilarious, others not so much. Being a special snowflake is so overrated, it's so much more fun to laugh and relate together - so shall we? :)

I have captured a lot of amazing moments which are breathtaking for me. Enjoy!
TITLE: I Photograph The Undiscovered Beauty Of Bulgaria

DESCRIPTION: My son loves cars. Especially old, vintage ones from 20s. So I've made a wooden replica for him which actually works.
TITLE: My Son Loves Vintage Cars, So I Made Him This Electric Replica From 20s

DESCRIPTION:
Light from just a safety match, poor light and even a Silver Body Painted Model. I like to experiment with new and unique techniques when I draw.
Let me know if you have any idea's that you want me to draw.
TITLE: I Love To Experiment With Drawing Techniques, Let Me Know What You Think

DESCRIPTION: Chidorigafuchi is a popular Cherry Blossom (Sakura) spot in Tokyo especially at night when they are illuminated. It's one of my favorite sakura spots but it gets extremely crowded!
TITLE: Japanese Cherry Blossoms In Tokyo

DESCRIPTION:
I've photographed hundreds of glowing flowers since 2014 after seeing Oleksandr Holovachov's work with ultraviolet-induced visible fluorescence (UVIVF) photography.
Each time I do a set of UVIVF photos, it starts with going out under the cover of darkness to snatch unsuspecting flowers growing around the neighborhood. I rarely know what to expect from a flower before I get it back to shoot.
TITLE: I Photographed The Invisible Light That Plants Emit

DESCRIPTION:
Working as design software testers can sometimes be demanding, so we decided to add some fun to our work.
Easter is coming so why not create some original decorations for our office. The only thing we used was a 3D modeling software and a 3D printer.
TITLE: We 3D Printed These Cute Easter Egg Decorations At Work

DESCRIPTION: Aquaponics is an effective alternative farming technique that drastically benefits the environment. It combines conventional aquaculture (raising aquatic animals such as snails or fish in tanks) with hydroponics (cultivating plants in water).
TITLE: Revolutionary Farming Technique That Uses Fish

DESCRIPTION: What happens when you put a young doggie, a visually-impaired cat, and a senior rat in one room? Well, if it's this adorable trio, Sasha the canine, Jack the feline and Tweaks the rat, this means they'll become BFF's. The unlikely friends were surrendered to the shelter by their human in March. Their owner could no longer care for them but they let us know they were very bonded, Jennifer Ollanketo of The Oshkosh Area Humane Society told Love Meow.
TITLE: After This Cat, Dog, And Rat Were Left At A Shelter Together They Refuse To Be Separated

DESCRIPTION: Architect Reza Asgaripour knows a genius hack that could take the perspective game of your drawings to another level. Reza fixed an elastic string on 3 fixed points and manipulated them with a paperclip, creating perfect straight angles for his building sketch.
TITLE: 3-Point Perspective Drawing Trick

DESCRIPTION: My first attempt at a spray paint rye concept. Hope you enjoy the video.
TITLE: Sunset Eye: Spray Paint Art

DESCRIPTION:
Since some years ago I make artistic butter cookies decorated with royal icing and food coloring. These is my last creation, chocolate cookies inspired by the beginning of spring in Japan.
I hope you like it.
TITLE: My Latest Cookies Are Inspired By Spring In Japan

DESCRIPTION: One of a kind porcelain dolls made by artists Aiis Roman and Gamalier Bravo.
TITLE: Impressive Engraved And Painted Tattoos On Small One Of A Kind Porcelain Dolls

DESCRIPTION:
I started using spray paint in December 2015. I was never able to find an art form that clicked with me until this.
Now here I am year and a half later and I couldn't be happier with my progress.
TITLE: I Create These Artworks Using Spray Paint

DESCRIPTION: For you, makeup only serves to make people beautiful? Then meeting the work of Mimi Choi, 31, from Vancouver, Canada, will change your mind ...
TITLE: awesome Makeup By Mimi Choi

DESCRIPTION:
Here is Nasir ol Molk Mosque in Shiraz, in South of IRAN.
I saw too many mosques around the world, whether by my own eyes or in photos. But I believe here is the most beautiful mosque you have ever seen.
TITLE: I Photographed Nasir-Ol-Molk, The Most Beautiful Mosque In The World

DESCRIPTION: This is a small series of paintings made for an exhibition with the theme: Rebirth. They are my thoughts of a better world through painted stories. This series of eight paintings combines fairytale symbolism with my personal journey of veganism and my hopes for humanity and the treatment of animals on this planet.
TITLE: I Paint Stories Using Fairytale Symbolism To Explore My Journey To Veganism

DESCRIPTION: If you're brave enough to ask someone for nudes, better be prepared for what's coming. Jacquie Ross, a 16-year-old from North Carolina, was asked by her friend Michael to text a picture of her outfit.
TITLE: Teen Asked To Send Nudes Has The Best Response Ever

DESCRIPTION:
I started creating art at the age of 4, I knew I wanted to create something similar to the pictures I saw in my books.
I wanted to recreate that feeling I had as a kid, flipping through the pages of a fairytale. I want my pictures to create some sort of emotion and hopefully inspire more people.
TITLE: I Draw Children Illustrations That Remind Me Of Childhood

DESCRIPTION: When Kristina Rinaldi, executive director of Detroit Dog Rescue (DDR), went to collect 6 puppies from the animal control, she was shocked. The neglected puppies were found in an abandoned house in Detroit, Michigan. They were pink and hairless, with painfull sores all over their body. On top of that, they had fever and it seemed like they were burning. When I say that these puppies were literally on fire, they were on fire, Rinaldi told The Dodo. They had high temperatures.
TITLE: After Horrible People Abandoned These Puppies, They Got So Sick They Had Lost All Their Fur

DESCRIPTION: Cat with moustache is a brand that was created quite unexpectedly. When I finished studying philology and worked as a decorator in a popular shop I was convinced that my childhood dream of working with animals was not fulfilled. Then something happened and everything was change.
TITLE: Forever Together: Hand-Painted Shoulder Bags With Animals In A Pocket

DESCRIPTION:
If you go to Morocco in the next days, don't forget to add Chefchaouen at your road-trip.
Chefchaouen is a small town in the north of Morocco with a little more than 42 000 inhabitants. Built at an altitude of over 600m at the foot of the Kelaa and Meggou mountains and very little traffic, fresh air is breathed in.
TITLE: Chefchaouen, The Blue Pearl Of Morocco

DESCRIPTION: Hong Kong Shing Mun Reservoir with IR filter.
TITLE: I Photographed Hong Kong Shing Mun Reservoir With Ir Filter

DESCRIPTION:
Maybe you have literally no idea what cake you want for your birthday. Maybe you just need some choices to make when you want a cake. Well, look no further!
Other bored panda users are going to be posting cakes they made themselves just for the fun of it!
TITLE: Hey Pandas, Show Us Your Cake Making Skills!

DESCRIPTION: Lara and Mara Bawar are not your average supermodels, but their striking appearance is sending shockwaves through the fashion industry. The 11-year-old twins from São Paulo, Brazil, have albinism, a condition that causes a lack of skin and hair pigment, and they embrace it to the fullest.
TITLE: Albino Twins From Brazil Are Taking The Fashion Industry By Storm With Their Unique Beauty

DESCRIPTION: Joe McGrath was supposed to go to Mallorca with 9 other friends to celebrate his pal's 30th birthday but he canceled at the last minute. Since his ticket was already booked in his name, his friend's did something pretty clever so the money wouldn't go to waste - found a random guy on Facebook with the same name and invited him to join them for a completely free all-inclusive trip!
TITLE: After Their Friend Cancels Trip At The Last Minute, They Invite A Complete Stranger With The SAME Name

DESCRIPTION:
So when my son (dog), Mustang, came into our lives, I decided I will photograph him and my daughter - Aayat. That ambitious project almost led to a divorce.
I asked my husband to assist me on my shoots and it was worse than asking him to help me practice my driving.
TITLE: I Tried Photographing My Daughter And My Dog And This Is What Happened

DESCRIPTION:
I am an Italian painter, who studied at the Academy of Fine Arts in Florence. I live and work in Madrid.
I realize my work with pen and ink on recycled wood.
TITLE: My Nature-Inspired Drawings That I Create On Recycled Wood

DESCRIPTION:
My friend from Kraków, Poland is a musician, in band called Gadabit and he creates sculptures using wire, rocks and crystals in his free time.
Recently he made music video in stop motion using some of his wire creatures.
TITLE: My Friend Creates Mystical Sculptures Using Wire, Rocks And Crystals

DESCRIPTION: Being a doctor is not only a hard job but an exhausting one too. Surgeon Luo Heng performed 5 operations over a total of 28 hours. He did two emergency surgery's overnight and then 3 more the following morning. After his extremely long shift, Heng was captured sleeping on the hospital floor and looking comfy as ever.
TITLE: Surgeon Caught Asleep On The Floor After Epic 28-Hour Shift, And Now His Photos Are Going Viral

DESCRIPTION: Have you ever dreamt about giving up everything and taking a trip around the world? Wladyslaw Labuda proves that this is possible and many of us can do that, even if we are out of money. In fact, our traveller didn't pay for an accommodation. It was his challenge.
TITLE: 3 Years, Forty Countries, One Man

DESCRIPTION: Do you remember Syria's 'cat man of Aleppo', also known as Alaa - a guy who became famous for saving animals throughout the war in Syria? A man who stayed with them until the very last second he had to flee for his life? Well, after spending a few months in Turkey, he's back. He's working on re-establishing the sanctuary for the homeless cats - and has just rescued a dog and her 15 puppies! See, his heart is open to both dogs and cats, and he's almost a saint when it comes to helping animals.
TITLE: Dog Abandoned With Her 15 Puppies Finds The Best Person To Help Them

DESCRIPTION: French photographer Sacha Goldberger is raising a lot more than just eyebrows with his latest photo series. Secret Eden is a set of photo pairs that, when put together in one's imagination, reveal salacious scenes. A deeper meaning, however, lies behind them.
TITLE: These Pairs Of Photos Become Very Dirty Only When You Combine Them In Your Head (NSFW)

DESCRIPTION:
Every week we try to participate with #bookfacefriday on Twitter and Instagram.
These are a few of our favorite results! All colleagues are eager to find their perfect bookface match.
TITLE: We Participate In Bookface Friday, Join Us!

DESCRIPTION: Waterfront Partnership's Healthy Harbor initiate has set themselves a challenge to reconnect the citizens of Baltimore to their environment and it is using a watermill-like trash-eating wheel to do that. Daniel Chase and John Kellet designed what locals call the Mr. Trash Wheel, and so far the barge has eaten over 1 million pounds (which is about 100K pounds more than a Boeing 747 weighs), but its appetite only grows!
TITLE: Meet Mr. Trash Wheel Who Eats Trash For Lunch

DESCRIPTION: I draw, sometimes on styrofoam cups.
TITLE: Battled Boredom By Drawing On Some More Cups

DESCRIPTION: An unmarked wooden box only 16 inches tall sat at the Beirut Airport in Lebanon for a week before being opened - and people were shocked to find out three endangered Siberian tiger cubs inside. Dehydrated and starved, they were covered in urine and feces, their bodies infested with hundreds of maggots. Nothing indicated that the box contained tigers or even live animals, and there were no details of a shipper or receiver, rescue group Animals Lebanon (AL) wrote.
TITLE: Mysterious Box Sat At The Airport For 7 Days Until Someone Finally Helped The Animals Trapped Inside (UPDATED)

DESCRIPTION:
Hey everyone!
I'm a 30-year-old illustrator based in Hamburg (Germany). I began creating comics on Instagram to share my life as a crazy cat lady and the awkward and funny moments of my two white cats.
Feel free to check out some of my artwork!
TITLE: My Diary Comics About My Life With Two Cheeky Cats

DESCRIPTION:
Muralist and painter Julio César Morales made a majestic work of art in Estelí, combining the nature and beauty of the woman, embodied in a perimeter wall, of a home located in the Orlando Ochoa neighborhood of the city of Estelí.
The work of art is located in Hardware Blandón Moreno one block north, where reflects the hair of an African-type woman who make up the trinitaria plants that stand out in the perimeter wall of the house of Doña Susy Díaz Flores, who reports Which is about the face of an 11-year-old girl.
TITLE: Artist Esteliano Surprises With Work Of Art

DESCRIPTION:
Manos likes to take pictures of things he finds interesting, especially little details he notices or beautiful skies. I like sketching and drawing things I find worth of depicting.
One day as I was scrawling down at Mano's Instagram pictures, I found myself building stories out of the images I was seeing.
TITLE: We Used Photography And Illustration To Make These Humorous And Surrealistic Images With A Bit Of Uncanny Aftertaste

DESCRIPTION: All of my pencil and ink drawings are done freehand. My digital designs are all done on my iPad mini with just my finger, no stylus. I draw because I love it, but after every finished work, I feel accomplished and proud.
TITLE: Just A Sample

DESCRIPTION: I draw from my heart and and am inspired to create every day. I see photos that bring out a reaction from me and illustrate what I'm feeling in the moment. I adore character design and the art of animation just as much as I love the fashion industry.
TITLE: I Combine My Animation Skills With My Love For Fashion

DESCRIPTION:
If you could choose any place in the world and wear it, where would it be? Through my Kickstarter campaign, any place in the world can be designed into a minimalist jewelry map, so you can take a memory and wear it.
For the past few years, I've been turning street maps into jewelry. I started with a collection of nine cities close to my heart.
TITLE: I Create Minimalist Jewelry Maps That Let You Wear Your Favorite Place On Earth

DESCRIPTION: Cats like attention, and as you can see from these photobombing felines, they'll do anything to get it! Whether they're crashing family photo shoots, private selfies, unsuspecting dogs, or even each other, these cats are on a mission to turn every purrfect picture into an absolute cat-astrophe! Check out this list, compiled by Bored Panda, for some hilarious furry photobombers. Don't forget to vote for the best!
TITLE: 10+ Times Asshole Cats Hilariously Photobombed Purrfect Shots

DESCRIPTION: Meet Scooter, the pup who was tied to a dumpster in a shopping mall parking lot and left with a following note: Free Pup. My name is Scooter. Owner Went To Jail Today.
TITLE: This Dog Was Tied To A Dumpster And Left With A Sad Note

DESCRIPTION:
This is Stripey our tiny four weeks old baby skunk.
I'm sure she thinks she is big and very dangerous. We love you our little baby girl.
TITLE: Tiny Baby Skunk Stomping For The First Time

DESCRIPTION: Former soldier Richard Browning has became a real-life Iron Man. He designed a costume that uses miniaturized jet engines and twin fuel bladders to hover above the ground.
TITLE: Man Builds Iron Man Costume

DESCRIPTION:
My name is Sara Henick and I am an artist who makes jewelry from found objects with a sense of history such as fossils, bones, wood and combine them with silver into beautiful new works of art that can relive the items past.
My jewelry is all handmade and not produced by big machinery featuring an oxidized ,unpolished and more rustic finish.
TITLE: I Reimagine Weathered And Worn Objects To Reveal The Beauty And History Behind Their Scars And Imperfections

DESCRIPTION: Every pet deserves to have a great adventure sometimes. Turn your cute fluffy cat into a mighty supervillain, or help your lazy dog to travel the world in a hot air balloon. It's up to you.
TITLE: Doodle Your Pets To Take Them On New Adventures

DESCRIPTION: It's hard to admit but let's face it - we all gossip. However, did you know that gossiping isn't exclusive to humans? A Nova Scotia Duck Tolling Retriever named Champis (who's passport says Tollergrenda's Victory Champagne) couldn't resist the temptation of sharing a personal secret with his Norwegian owner.
TITLE: Gossiping With A Dog

DESCRIPTION:
Microcapsmic is a vision of Cosmos where spray paint caps [microcosm] are regarded as the epitome of the Universe [macrocosm] and vice versa.
Used and naturally clogged in the most random ways possible, these spray paint caps were once indistinguishable from one another to the human eye and untouched by the human hand in the making.
Now, each of them is considered to be small-scale models of the Universe that they created it.
TITLE: Ultra Macro Photos Of Graffiti Spray Caps That Were Used To Paint Cosmic Murals

DESCRIPTION: Alina Sanina is a wonderful artist and as not so many of us, she does what she loves the most in her life. Her passion lays in making amazing realistic animal jewelry, decorative objects and dolls and the way she does it will really blow your mind just by looking at them. These creatures, some of them are a wonderful replicas of the most famous cartoon characters and some are from her own imagination, but every piece has her own special touch to it which makes it very unique and alive.
TITLE: Magical Creature Jewelry Hand-Sculpted By Alina Sanina

DESCRIPTION:
There comes a day in each pet's life when, out of nowhere, it hears its name called from the bathroom. Some pets can't hold their excitement to splash some soapy water, but let's be honest, most of them try to avoid bath time by any means necessary or stare straight into your soul, judging you for the worst betrayal in animal history.
Needless to say, most pets will go from cute to cuter when wet, so if you have an adorable or funny photo of your pet taking a bath, go ahead and share it with us!
TITLE: Share Pictures Of Your Pets Having A Bath

DESCRIPTION: Have you ever been in a situation when you look at someone and you feel like you're looking in a mirror? You definitely have if you have an identical twin brother or sister, but if you don't, seeing another person who looks like or is dressed like you can make you feel like the universe is a skipping CD.
TITLE: 10+ Real Glitches In The Matrix That Will Freak You Out

DESCRIPTION: Brazilian psychology student Bruno Borges seemed fine when he left his family home to work on a 'secretive project' last Monday, but he hasn't been seen since then. His concerned relatives managed to access his locked room, and what they found inside was both bizarre and disturbing.
TITLE: Man Disappears In Brazil, Leaves Behind Locked Room With 14 Books Of Encrypted Text And A $2500 Statue

DESCRIPTION: As any mom or expectant mom will already know, pregnancy is hard work. If fact, let's be honest, pregnancy for many women downright sucks. Sure it's a small price to pay to bring your bundle of joy into this world, but it doesn't feel like such a small price when you can't sneeze without peeing your pants, or when you keep throwing up right after you brush your teeth every morning.
TITLE: 10+ Tweets About Pregnancy That Will Make You Laugh And Cry

DESCRIPTION:
Painting is my hobby and to paint these sneakers was really fun for me :D.
I made this using fabric paint and it took me 4 hours to complete it.
Watch my work in the following video.
TITLE: Painting On Some Sneakers

DESCRIPTION: Photographer Corey Hancock was hiking a trail in Oregon when he spotted something that turned out to be a baby bear on the brink of death. Hancock wrote that the bear was laying there on his back, seeming by all appearances to be dead. His lips were blue. His eyes were open, but unmoving and hazy. The rain was pouring down, drenching his belly. I might have seen a shallow breath.
TITLE: This Guy Risked Jail Time To Rescue A Dying Baby Bear He Found On A Hike

DESCRIPTION:
Sometimes people find inspiration in the most unexpected places. Some find nature or other people inspiring, but Heather Penn found her drive to create in tea.
In 2006 Heather began drawing tea spirits as a way to creatively channel her love of tea.
TITLE: Artist Expresses Her Love For Tea By Drawing Magical Tea Spirits

DESCRIPTION:
Like the title says. Hope they'll make you happy too.
I'm 21 years old art student from Poland.
TITLE: My Sad Drawings That Make Me Happy

DESCRIPTION: I remove the black color (which I don't remember what material was it) with a knife. That was for a project in Holon Institute of Technology.
TITLE: I Draw By Removing The Color From The Board

DESCRIPTION:
Babies are such interesting little creatures. While we goo and gaga at their cuteness, there are somethings that you may not know that are actually quite fascinating!
If babies kept growing at the rate they do in the first year, do you know how tall they would be as adults (uhm huge!)? Do babies really have more bones than adults?
Here are six mind-blowing facts about your baby we bet you didn't know.
TITLE: 6 Facts About Baby That Might Blown You Away

DESCRIPTION: A resident of England was able to take a picture of an albino squirrel, living in a city park. But the image of the small mammal with a rare mutation does not look as nice as you can imagine. Instead, I remember that they are often compared to conventional urban mice.
TITLE: Rare Albino Squirrel Is Photographed

DESCRIPTION: For this year's #36daysoftype challenge I thought of combining my interest for comics with my love for minimalist illustrations. So I began creating an illustrated alphabet that pays tribute to various comic book superheroes and villains. Keeping a minimalist style, each one of the 26 letters aims to capture the features of a particular character through geometric form, colors, specific symbols and so on.
TITLE: I Combined My Interest For Comics With My Love For Minimalist Illustrations In The Superheroes Alphabet Series

DESCRIPTION:
My name is Lillwihlen and I like to capture special moments with my iPhone and publish them on Instagram.
Sometimes I add a surreal/comic twist to my photos or use a forced perspective. Here's a few examples from the last couple of months.
TITLE: I Like To Capture Special Moments With My iPhone And Add A Surreal Twist To Them (Part 4)

DESCRIPTION: Evan Stoler is an artist who uses multiples of mundane objects such tape, spoons, staples, Smarties and more to create sculptural and two dimensional work largely by gluing. He aims to make the mundane mystical.
TITLE: Common Objects Transformed Into Works Of Art

DESCRIPTION:
I started painting on real animal skulls when I saw painted mask in music festival. Thought that it would be great accessory for my room, but couldn't buy it anywhere, so started creating by myself.
Now you can see what happened.
TITLE: I Help Dead Animals To Reborn

DESCRIPTION: I have never been one to shy away from telling the story of how my husband and I became parents. It was a long journey that started at the end of 2009 and was filled with two miscarriages, uterine surgery, and lots and lots of infertility treatments. After my miscarriages, I went to a fertility specialist and was diagnosed with PCOS (polycystic Ovarian Syndrome).
TITLE: Side By Side Comparison Of My Singleton Pregnancy And My Twin Pregnancy

DESCRIPTION:
I quit my job a year ago and started to pursue my artistic career by creating a Facebook page and YouTube channel for my drawings.
Ever since then, I've been successful in receiving regular commissioned pieces and selling prints!
I started off doing graphite pencil sketches of customers' pets and family members, then I discovered Prismacolor Pencils through artists on Instagram.
Now, I draw anything and everything, ranging from pet portraits, anime characters and gaming loot!
I love drawing a variety of things, as I am inspired and interested in so much, so I don't want to restrict myself to drawing one type of subject.
TITLE: I Do Stylized Photorealistic Time Lapse Drawings

DESCRIPTION:
Having trained as a fine art sculptor, I make my figures from 7 and 12 vinyl music records, combining them with modern materials such as perspex and acrylic.
Mainly receiving donations of unwanted record collections, I try to emote the feelings and actions of the owners who once enjoyed the records - dancing, reclining, revelling in the music.
With the rise of vinyl record sales, a percentage of them do so for nostalgia and the collection of memories.
TITLE: I Make Figurative Sculptures From Vinyl Records

DESCRIPTION: Victoria Baldwin and Adam Dyson may be divorced, but they still meet every year to take a family photo. This special tradition they share with their son Bruce, and the touching story behind it has gone viral after Baldwin shared it on Love What Matters, a Facebook news outlet.
TITLE: Divorced Couple Still Takes A Family Photo With Their Son Every Year For The Most Beautiful Reason

DESCRIPTION: Spring is upon us, and summer isn't far behind it, meaning floral printed everything is officially necessary - including tattoos.
TITLE: 10+ Floral Tattoo Artists Who Will Make You Want To Get Inked

DESCRIPTION:
When traveling, I try to find places where historical photographs were taken.
And this is the result of these journeys and searches.
TITLE: I Inserted Old Photos Into Popular Destinations During My Travels

DESCRIPTION: Daniela Majic is a photographer whose on going series entitled The Secret Garden has her hand building her own sets in her tiny attic. Majic's latest installment for the series are images entitled The Sun Queen which are reinterpretations of the paintings Gold Tears and Portrait Of Adele Bloch Bauer by Gustav Klimt. Model Hillary is seen surrounded by yellow hues of gorgeous flowers wearing a collar that Majic made by hand.
TITLE: Photographer Creates Modern Day Images Inspired By Gustav Klimt Paintings

DESCRIPTION: I made this independent animation by hand painting. Each detail and object like petal or raindrop is unique. In this animation, I construct the dreamlike and mythical world where the mythical beasts live.
TITLE: Mythical Beats In There

DESCRIPTION:
We all have dreams that range in size, scope and silliness. Since January 2016 I have been photographing strangers on the streets of London and asking them, what is your dream?
One of my dreams is to publish a street portraits photo book featuring the people I have met doing this.
The aim of the project is to show that no matter who you are or what you do you should always have dreams and be unafraid to pursue them.
TITLE: Since January 2016 I Have Been Chasing Dreams On The Streets Of London

DESCRIPTION:
Brand+movie? Logo+film? YEEEEEAH!
Just another mash-up for your eyes! 'Cause we love branding and most of all movies!
TITLE: I Mashed Up Brands And Movies Into One

DESCRIPTION: Meet Angel Marie, the three-legged pony who lost her leg after her mother accidentally stepped on the little horse. This happened shortly after Angel Marie's birth and the tiny horse had to learn to live like an amputee - until Derrick Campana, aka Virginia's Dr Doolittle stepped in and saved the day by providing the pony with a prosthetic leg.
TITLE: Pony Stands On Her Feet For The First Time With Prosthetic Limbs After Birth Accident

DESCRIPTION: Harvard researchers have developed a reconfigurable structure that looks like a 3D shapeshifting puzzle. They built it from metamaterials - materials whose function is determined by structure, not composition.
TITLE: This Shapeshifting Paper Puzzle Could Change The Way We Build Things

DESCRIPTION:
I'm Lipstick Lex and I create art with 100% lipstick - NO PAINT!
Art created by KISSING the canvas and drawing/smudging using only lipstick, my lips and brushes as my tools. Then I protect each piece with a coat of epoxy resin..
TITLE: Kissed Art: I Use Only Lipsticks To Create These Paintings

DESCRIPTION: I made this drawing of Mark Gonzales with 1.5 million dots with a ballpoint pen. It is 11x17 inches and took me over 150 hours to complete.
TITLE: Ballpoint Pen Dot Drawing Of Mark Gonzles

DESCRIPTION:
I'm a full time contemporary artist from Minneapolis. Over time, brushes became cliché, and then palette knives felt too ordinary.
I created a shoe palette knife which allows me to use my feet to create interesting art on the floor.
TITLE: I Make Abstract Paintings With My Feet

DESCRIPTION: Around the city with roller skates and playing with the sunset's shadows.
TITLE: Playing With Shadows: Black And White Street Photography

DESCRIPTION: Every girl loves fashion. That's no difference for girls with disabilities. So Elianne and me teamed up to do a fashion shoot.
TITLE: A Fashion Shoot With Two Disabled Models!

DESCRIPTION:
I bet most of you never hear about Lombok before.
Lombok is one of province in Indonesia, next from Bali, often called sister island of Bali.
But, not like the busy Bali, Lombok more quite and have slow pace.
TITLE: Little Heaven Called Lombok

DESCRIPTION: Modern society tells us to do well in school, work as hard as we can, and eventually teach our kids to do the same. It's an endless cycle that doesn't exactly leave much room for creativity. This short film is encouraging people to look at things differently, and is striking a cord.
TITLE: How Society Destroys Your Creativity, In An Award-Winning Pixar-Like Short Film

DESCRIPTION: Cats are probably the cutest and the most evil things ever - one second they show their affection and the next they want to punch you in the face. They are adorable to look at and are great companions. Wait, did I say cats? I meant humans.
TITLE: 10+ Comics Showing What Would Happen If Cats And Humans Switched Roles

DESCRIPTION: Meet Hana - the Scottish fold kitty from Japan who came to grow quite an impressive fan base on Instagram.
TITLE: Meet Hana, A Japanese Kitty With Incredibly Big Eyes Who Is Taking Instagram By Storm

DESCRIPTION: Recently we brought you a video of a 10-year-old autistic girl singing Hallelujah in a choir in Northern Ireland. Well now we've got another equally stunning rendition of Leonard Cohen's masterpiece for you, this time sung by Tiffany Day, a 17-year-old high school student from Kansas, and if this doesn't give you goosebumps then we really don't know what will!
TITLE: This 17-Year-Old Girl Singing Hallelujah Into A Well Is Going Viral Because, Well, Just Watch It
